environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_MCP_SERVER_TRANSPORT
environmentVariables.description: MCP Server transport type - valid values are 'http' or 'stdio', defaulting to 'stdio'.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE_USER
environmentVariables.description: Database user name. Can be optional depending on the database connection type.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE_PASSWORD
environmentVariables.description: Database user password. Can be optional depending on the database connection type.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_JDBC_URL
environmentVariables.description: JDBC URL for database connection. If this is provided, the server, host, port and database are not used.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_SERVER
environmentVariables.description: SchemaCrawler database plugin, for example, 'sqlserver' or 'sqlite'. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_HOST
environmentVariables.description: Database host. Defaults to localhost. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_PORT
environmentVariables.description: Database port. Defaults to the default port for the server type. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE
environmentVariables.description: Database to connect to (optional). Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_INFO_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: How much database metadata to retrieve. Values are 'minimum', 'standard', 'detailed' or 'maximum'.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Logging verbosity level. Values are 'SEVERE', 'WARNING', 'INFO', 'CONFIG', or 'FINE'.

environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_EXCLUDE_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: MCP Server tools to exclude, as a comma-separated list.
